metadata.title: CVE-2019-17569 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The refactoring present in Apache Tomcat 9.0.28 to 9.0.30, 8.5.48 to 8.5.50and 7.0.98 to 7.0.99 introduced a regression. The result of the regressionwas that invalid Transfer-Encoding headers were incorrectly processedleading to a possibility of HTTP Request Smuggling if Tomcat was locatedbehind a reverse proxy that incorrectly handled the invalidTransfer-Encoding header in a particular manner. Such a reverse proxy isconsidered unlikely.

criterions.comment: tomcat7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
